features: Quick-drying 79% recycled polyester/21% spandex fabric for enhanced stretch and movement; with HeiQ® Fresh durable odor control
Center-back pocket and two no-bounce side pockets for phone storage, snacks, map and more while you are on the move
Soft, flat, quick-drying elastic for added comfort
Fabric treated with HeiQ® Fresh durable odor control

Body: 8.5-oz 79% recycled polyester/21% spandex power-stretch knit with miDori™ bioSoft for added wicking and softness, and HeiQ® Fresh durable odor control. Contrast panel: 1.5-oz Pertex® 100% nylon (54% recycled) stretch taffeta with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
